memberdef.name: Maketest
memberdef.initializer:
do { \ int rc; \ printf("
======== TEST %s =========

",name); \ rc = func(); \ if (rc) \ printf("
-------- %s : %d ---------
",name,rc); \ else \ printf("
-------- %s : OK ---------
",name); \ } while (0)

briefdescription.para: Tests for testing the mount protocol routines.
